column4: I've dapper installed and some problem with the graphic card. Should I upgrade to edgy?
depends. if edgy is right for you, why arent you running it alread? if it isnt, then the awnser is 'no, you shouldnt upgrade under any circumstances'. whats the problem you are having with your card?
I didn't upgrade yet because I hadn't the time to upgrade, possibly break the system and find time to fix it.
